snippet: A second resident was seriously injured in the fire, which broke out on the 20th floor of the 42-story building on West 43rd Street.
abstract: Daniel McClung is killed and dozens of residents are displaced in three-alarm fire at luxury high-rise building on West 43rd Street in Manhattan; fire sends some residents running out of building and others onto balconies to escape the smoke; two men are found critically injured in smoky stairwell and are taken to hospital, where McClung died.

byline.original: By EMMA G. FITZSIMMONS and ALEX VADUKUL

lead_paragraph: A second resident was seriously injured in the fire, which broke out on the 20th floor of the 42-story building on West 43rd Street.

headline.main: Fire in Luxury High-Rise Kills One and Displaces Dozens in Hell’s Kitchen
headline.print_headline: Fire in Luxury High-Rise Kills One and Displaces Dozens in Hell’s Kitchen
